overview: Sydney Fairchild, the daughter of a woman who was once loved by three bachelors, surprises the men with a visit. Findley, Trumbull, and Gaunt honor their former sweetheart's last request by becoming Sydney's guardians.
tagline: Like a breath of Springtime -she came into the lives of these three old bachelors- and then circumstantial evidence branded her a criminal!
title: Three Wise Fools
